Highlights.name: Scientific Approach to Talent Solutions

Highlights.description: Mentis Global offers solutions specifically for executive and leadership development [1]. This suggests that they have a deep understanding of the challenges that businesses face in developing their leaders, and they offer programs that can help leaders to be more successful.

enhanced_description: Mentis Talent Tech is a pioneer in optimizing human potential by enabling powerful people networks to work better together. Leveraging next-generation Organizational Network Analysis (ONA) and proven scientific prediction tailored to organizations, they provide greater accessibility to valuable people insights. This data-driven approach helps businesses make better decisions about their hiring and development strategies, fostering exceptional experiences of partnership, collaboration, and trust. Mentis offers specialized solutions for executive and leadership development, alongside courses and accreditation programs, providing a comprehensive solution for talent development needs. Their work aligns with the UN Sustainable Development Goal 8, promoting decent work and economic growth.
